reviewText: One of the best METALLICA  Performances ever and the best part is that you can take the orchestra out of it if you're into METALLICA more than the orchestra great sound great image great everything

Outstanding concert performance. Been a favorite of mine since I was a kid, you just can't go wrong. The way the music of Metallica and the San Francisco Symphony is melded together is truly captivating. If you are a fan of Metallica or not, you owe it to yourself to check this dvd out. Smartpak (for those unaware), is a CD case style packaging.
Whoever thought Metallica and an orchestra would go together?  Yet it works and works wonderfully well.  An outstanding performance.

I like Metallica and have most of their albums, Had to get this after hearing the album. Watching them play with the orchestra and seeing how much pure fun they were having playing the music together was a cool experience.
Perfect. It was exactly as described.
